import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './Table.css'; import Button from '../Button/Button'; import { PlusIcon, PencilIcon, TrashIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Search from '../search/Search'; const DataFetching = () => { const [todo,setTodo] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:3001/todo/read") .then(todo =>setTodo(todo.data)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) },[]) return (

Todo-List

Todo-ID Title Created-by Created-date Updated-date Dead-line Description Progress Edit Delete
{todoId} {title} {createdBy} {createdDate} {updatedDate} {deadline} {description} {progress}
) } export default DataFetching;
